CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): moved from A.1.14 (AE Object)
E2B (R3): E.i.8 Medical Confirmation by Healthcare Professional Conformance: Optional Data Type: Boolean OID: None Value Allowed: false, true
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If an event is reported by a non healthcare professional (e.g. lawyers, consumers), this data element indicates whether the occurrence of the event was subsequently confirmed by a healthcare professional.
CustomField.label: Confirmed by HCP
